website_summaries.verdict: The Canon EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS STM is one of the better starter lenses out there, but it has the same flaws that are common in similar lenses.

customer_reviews.title: I wish I had bought it sooner
customer_reviews.text: I have an old Rebel T2i body and kit lens which stopped working a while back after tens of thousands of pictures of my kids. I finally realized it wasn't worth trying to get the old lens fixed and that the camera body was fine so I upgraded to this one and figured I would upgrade the body later. It works amazingly well. At first, I thought the autofocus was still broken it was working so silently, but sure enough, all my pictures are in focus. I just wish I had thought to replace the lens sooner! I missed a lot of nice shots this past year.
customer_reviews.author: E. M. Lefavour

customer_reviews.title: Lens came scratched and auto focus doesn't work at all... big waste of money and time.
customer_reviews.text: I expected a good lens from a lot of the good reviews posted on this lens, however the lens arrived today in a small box that had very little in the way of protection. one small strip of thin bubble wrap. okay not a big deal but when I opened the box the lens had a massive scratch across it (see picture). Then I put it on my camera to see if it even worked and the Auto Focus doesn't work at all. Really disappointed here and will just be buying from somewhere else...
customer_reviews.author: Matthew blum

customer_reviews.title: I challenge anyone to find a better lens for the price
customer_reviews.text: This lens lacks the features found on more expensive lenses, but I sell my work, and even the most trained eyes can't tell the difference in image quality in my finished images versus those taken with more expensive lenses. The autofocus is competent. The manual focus override is clumsy, but I rarely use it. Weather/dust seals are satisfactory for the price, though I would say that's the weak point of this lens. On the other hand, it's lightweight and makes a great hiking lens. If you drop it, you're not out the price of a used Toyota Corolla like would be the casse with high-end lenses.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: not to shabby
customer_reviews.text: I bought to take pictures of a new baby because my older more expensive lens broke while carrying in the camera bag, I didn't want to spend another $400 bucks so I got this lens to tide me over, I am used to more expensive lenses and I suppose I'm a little bit of a lens snob but this lens is fast to focus with the new stepper motor, and the 3.5 to 5.6 Fstop isn't so bad for taking family photos with a new born and I am not worried if I break this lens the its cheap enough and I can even get a little blurr at 3.5
customer_reviews.author: rbo350

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade for anyone with an older kit lens on a newer body.
customer_reviews.text: Great little lens for everyday photography. My previous "everyday" lens was an old EF-S 18-55mm kit lens with NO image stabilization, and it has seen a LOT of action over the years...so let's just say this Canon EF-S 18-55mm IS STM lens is a big upgrade for me over that. The new focus system of the STM takes a little getting used to since it's a ring that spins infinitely in either direction - but it was a quick and painless process, and I highly prefer the new focus system over the old. The focus ring is nice and "creamy" when you're operating it. It's excellent for shooting video with, too, since the autofocus motor is pretty much totally silent.
customer_reviews.author: Heart

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the original
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace my original camera lens since the auto focus crapped out. This was about the same price so I figured I'd give it a shot (no pun intended). It is well built, sturdy and solid like the original but the pictures just don't seem as crisp as the originals did. I do have an older Rebel t3 camera and I'm far from any professional photographer, but it is something I notice. Would I buy it again, yes but if I really cared about image quality I would just upgrade my entire camera - I'm not sure what your situation is.
customer_reviews.author: Justin323032

customer_reviews.title: Great For Me - A Hobbyist
customer_reviews.text: I'm certainly no photography expert, but this lens is now the main lens I use with my Canon D-40. Supposedly it doesn't compare with an "L" lens, and I wouldn't know - I've never had an "L" because they're crazy expensive. But compared to the 2 lenses that came with my D-40 (28-135mm zoom and 50mm fixed), this thing is more flexible, smaller and lighter than my other zoom, and still gives great shots. You can get a much wider view than you can with the other lenses I mentioned, and still get pretty good zoom. It will probably become your main lens unless your a pro.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Valentine

customer_reviews.title: Mostly good, but my copy had terrible corner softness.
customer_reviews.text: My rating is 3 stars because the top corners of the lens are EXTREMELY soft. It might be my copy, but it was no where this terrible on the old version. I know this is a beginner lens, but I got this to replace my overused and broken Canon 18-55. The new STM motor is great. It was so silent that I thought it wasn't working. Took me by surprise. It's good for the price I got it at. Much less barrel distortion at 18mm. Super loose focusing ring with rubber (unlike the old version). Great for those who want pretty much silent focusing during video on the T5i and so on.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Defective upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: Scary packaging with very little care for the lens being placed in a cheap white cardboard box inside the standard shipping box. The lens would not focus on my T-3i. No data with it, it could have come from anywhere ! Beware and check it out thoroughly upon receipt.
customer_reviews.author: Tedders

customer_reviews.title: If you can only have 1 lens get this one
customer_reviews.text: One of the best of the line of lenses for the EF series. If you only have one lens, get this one. Very clear and auto focus, on the T6i was impeccable.
customer_reviews.author: Glockman4519

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I liked the price. But the picture quality is really horrible. I'm not sure if it's not a genuine canon lens or if it's a really old version of it. Either way I'd not reccomend it.
customer_reviews.author: 123AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Great Lens
customer_reviews.text: I fell and broke my original lens on a European cruise trip last year. I replaced it with this lens that works great. I've had no problems with it and it operates just like the original. In addition, the cost was much less than it would cost to repair the broken one.
customer_reviews.author: JB 41

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying if you dont have it.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Super easy to switch between auto and manual focus. Great quality pictures with it. Mostly using to take pictures of my family and the landscape. Very good for trying to get a wider angle shot for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan McBride

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Low cost lens for landscape photography
customer_reviews.text: This lens is grossly underestimated for quality landscape photos. The old models do not have Internal Focus (IF).. Circular polarizers/ Graduated ND filters can now be easily used with this version. A low cost alternative to take nice landscape photos due to the small (58mm) filters required.. 58mm vs 77/82 filters will knock off 50% or more in price. I notice a nice improvement in focus locking in w/o hunting compared to the older version. I ofton find myself using this lens due to being lightweight, compact & less expensive to replace. Don't let canon marketing mislead you..this is a lens which is very usable and performs much closer to more expensive models than given credit for
customer_reviews.author: J Gwinn

customer_reviews.title: Great for movieing! (yes that's a real word?)
customer_reviews.text: As many have, I've found myself turning more and more to shooting short videos with my dSLR and this is a great change over the T3i that I had before. The focus in the movie is a tad bit spotty, but I think that's a function of my lack of expertise with the focusing modes (point vs. area best guess) while shooting. I've only had it a short while, but it has been ultra silent.I used the manual focus in a beach shoot with a friend popping the question with great results. :)
customer_reviews.author: Wim

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace the stock EF-S 18-55mm IS II lens. It runs much quieter than stock, when focusing, and takes great pictures. The only thing is the mounting ring is different, and I had to get a new hood.
customer_reviews.author: Tim M

customer_reviews.title: Not great...not horrible...it's a kit lens
customer_reviews.text: I needed a cheap lens to cover the medium rages and this fit the bill. It will not win any awards for quality, but for the price point, it is a decent lens.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Southerland

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement lens
customer_reviews.text: This is a great replacement for my original kit lens. Fast and quiet auto focus and nice overall fit and finish. Looks great on my EOS T2i.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Great little lens
customer_reviews.text: Five stars for its value and features. Much better than I expected. Considerably improved over previous versions. Internal focus(front element doesn't turn), practically silent focusing(even quieter than my 40mm STM), manual focus without flipping a switch(with shutter button pressed halfway), very good image quality for a budget general purpose lens. Haven't had it very long yet but plan on using it a lot. It's so small and light it's easy to carry around all day on my Canon 60D. The best is still the 17-55 2.8IS but it weighs a ton in comparison. I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert McClintock

customer_reviews.title: Good basic lens
customer_reviews.text: This is one of Canon's basic lenses and, as such, meets the high standards of Canon for this level of lens. The one aspect that resulted in less than five stars is that it is a bit slow in its auto-focus feature (despite the production notes advertised with the lens), nothing to detract from its overall quality, but for quick action shots that need rapid focusing capability to "catch" the shot, it tends to take a few milliseconds longer than the higher quality lenses . . . not measured, subjective observation.
customer_reviews.author: Coyote

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement lens
customer_reviews.text: My original lens took a dip in a muddy creek, so I needed a replacement. This one works just the same, so I'm a happy camper with a tighter grip on my lenses!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff J

customer_reviews.title: Good product, on-time delivery
customer_reviews.text: Good product but focus and picture quality not as good as I'd expected. This might be an issue with the camera and not the lens though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: STM Lens
customer_reviews.text: I had the same telephoto Canon lens kit. Auto focus introduced noise when video shooting. I ordered the same lens with STM focus motor technology. No noise when auto focusing. Very pleased with this lens EO-S 18-55MM STM
customer_reviews.author: michael brooks

customer_reviews.title: Perfect wide angle lens!
customer_reviews.text: Great Lens! I have done some tests with it and it is sharp and the video isn't grainy. Autofocus during video is just fine! (Update) The pictures are definitely not sharp, good color, and autofocus is is slow because it is not usm. Not as sharp as an L Lens, but it works for now.
customer_reviews.author: Weston Ney Photo Video

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beginners. Otherwise...okay
customer_reviews.text: You are purchasing a pretty cheap lens. Don't expect a whole lot. It is good as a back up or a just in case lens. My original one got destroyed in Kuwait. Ordered this as a replacement. Not bad. Not great. But perfect if you are learning.
customer_reviews.author: Micah R.

customer_reviews.title: Quiet-non-moving front element
customer_reviews.text: Unlike the old AF IS lenses this one is quiet, front element doesn't move - you don't have to readjust your polarizing filter after AF
customer_reviews.author: Sandra K. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Nice and smooth AF
customer_reviews.text: This lens is very nice for handheld video, it's super light, fast and smoth focus. Wouldn't recommend it for 4k, but for 1080p is OK. Extremely silent operation.
customer_reviews.author: Thelma

customer_reviews.title: Good lens
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace the same lens on my camera (the auto focus broke). It came as described (white box) and looked new. Works great. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Alphadog

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shots
customer_reviews.text: It was a replacement lens and it serves its purpose....very inexpensive and gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Herman Delgado

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Lens
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because the final lens does not turn. I shoot pictures through a spotting scope on occasion and due to the attachment of camera to scope via the threads on the end of the scope I needed one that didn't turn while focusing. An extra bonus is the square gel filters can be used, as well as a circular polarizer, because the lens won't shift the polarization out of alignment.
customer_reviews.author: J.I.N.K.S.

customer_reviews.title: huge difference for making videos!!!!
customer_reviews.text: huge difference for making videos on our Canon camera, it's totally quiet and you don't hear the lens moving at all. good service, came packed well. we have been using it a lot and have had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: A.H.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Brand new, with no issues. Love the pictures it produce. I am an absolute novice when it comes to photography but this lens provide great quality pictures without need for touch up.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgitte

customer_reviews.title: Love this lens!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great lens for general pictures! I use my macro lens most of the time, but some things are just too big for a macro. It's easy to put on and take off..I love the STM...doesn't require a tripod, if you can hold still...
customer_reviews.author: McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Is what it says.
customer_reviews.text: Works well local camera shop wanted 300.00 for this same lens..
customer_reviews.author: Mike Carr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The price doesn't get any better. Perfect for my Rebel.
customer_reviews.author: A. O. Reason

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement part when clutsy husband drops original
customer_reviews.text: Replacement for one on my wife's camera that I dropped and broke. Best price I could find on exact unit she wanted as a replacement. Took it out of the box and it worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Stephens

customer_reviews.title: The kit lens for shooting Video.
customer_reviews.text: I checked the optics and they are good for a kit lens, but this drive motor is quieter so it will work well when shooting videos. Otherwise, it's practically the same as the standard EF-S 18-55.
customer_reviews.author: Don K in Alaska

customer_reviews.title: Replacement
customer_reviews.text: My initial lens went janky very quick so this is a replacement
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Dyson

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace the exact same lens that no longer worked...exact lens, exact performance!!
customer_reviews.author: Terri Hymer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lens addition!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace one just like it that had been dropped. Beautiful photos and I love the stabilization and auto focus features!
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Yes
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Perfect replacement for the one my kid broke.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Kummer

customer_reviews.title: Solid lens for the money
customer_reviews.text: solid little lens for a great price.. a back up lens for a back up camera.. decent quality and very good at focusing for video combined with the Canon SL1.. I think we paid about $70 so obviously not for top professional work
customer_reviews.author: junglecatimages

customer_reviews.title: Perfect match and great value
customer_reviews.text: Great replacement for the one I dropped and cracked. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Auto focus and manual focus inoperable. Misleading advertisement for this lens.
customer_reviews.text: The auto focus does not work. The manual focus does not work. The zoom in and out does work. Misleading advertisement for this lens.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Alan Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Really nice lens for the price
customer_reviews.text: Here is an excellent photo value for your Canon DSLR.
customer_reviews.author: J. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Good place for good product
customer_reviews.text: Replacing lens and this did the job. Took on trip to Switzerland and got beautiful pics!
customer_reviews.author: Ita

customer_reviews.title: Ok but get the brand name lens
customer_reviews.text: It works but not nearly as well as the brand name. Doesn’t lock securely so you have to be a little careful with it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: INCREDIBLE Lens for videos!!
customer_reviews.text: This lens is INCREDIBLE for video making. The auto focus is SO smooth, and you can't hear anything in video recordings. Exactly what I was hoping for!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Kait

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: The lens works great. Very clear and works perfectly. My package was supposed to be delivered and was lost. I contacted customer service and they were very helpful and made sure that I got my package. Great customer service and great product!
customer_reviews.author: Dewayne H.

customer_reviews.title: Dynamic
customer_reviews.text: A very dynamic lense for picture and video. Auto focus is literally silent which is amazing. Very light and compact for travel or small camera bags. Smooth manual focus ring. Very good quality for the price
customer_reviews.author: jesse

customer_reviews.title: Item as promised
customer_reviews.text: The lens works great! Delivery was timely! Good sale! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Harold Seymour

customer_reviews.title: Works great with the newest generation Canon EOS 1.6 crop DSLRs with video capabilities!
customer_reviews.text: Quick, silent and accurate focusing. A little soft around the edges but I expected that in this class of lens. If you want tack sharp images, edge to edge, get some "L" glass. I bought this to go with the new SL1 body that I got the wife. Works like a charm and she is quite happy!
customer_reviews.author: Bill Langton

customer_reviews.title: Great lense!
customer_reviews.text: The original lense that came with my camera body stopped focusing so I purchased this one as a replacement. Lense works great and shipped very fast...I ordered late on a Tuesday evening and it was delivered early Thursday morning.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Renfrew

customer_reviews.title: Best option for canon lenses in amazon.
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect as a replacement kit lens. And he price is incredible!!!! Definitely the best option on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Kristyn Dingman

customer_reviews.title: Everyone needs a nifty fifty
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described on the product page. Item was in new condition and works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: G. Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Produces really nice photos of buildings and monuments.
customer_reviews.text: I really love this lens and am so happy that I bought it. It has allowed me to get photos I would never be able to get. It is super-easy to put on the camera body - can be done quickly. If you are going traveling and you are wanting to photograph big monuments and buildings, this lens will help you produce beautiful photos.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat it for the money. If I could ...
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat it for the money. If I could only have one lens under $150... it would be a cheap 50 prime....LOL. But if I could only have 2... well, this would be my second lens.
customer_reviews.author: The GongsTop Contributor: Smart Home

customer_reviews.title: This one is pretty good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased to replace a stock lens from years ago. This one is pretty good for the price. I do recommend. :)
customer_reviews.author: JBP

customer_reviews.title: Decent performance fragile construction
customer_reviews.text: cheap plastic construction replaced same lens that was dropped on grass and literally exploded. Lens is worth 80 as a general purpose kit lens.
customer_reviews.author: charles m. taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great Basic Lens
customer_reviews.text: Great lens. I have a canon 60D. I never had a kit lens. Got the camera body and got 50mm 1.8. So glad I got this basic lens and for the price it can’t be beat
customer_reviews.author: Lexi Green

customer_reviews.title: Super disappointed. I rarely used it and it was ...
customer_reviews.text: Auto focus stopped working after a few months. Manual only. Super disappointed. I rarely used it and it was never dropped. No reason it should have broken.
customer_reviews.author: Its Us.

customer_reviews.title: Great Lens
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic replacement lens - delivered on time & well packaged
customer_reviews.author: Pepelpew

customer_reviews.title: AF doesn't work correctly. In this mode camera's shooting button doesn't respond, why?
customer_reviews.text: I have a question about AF (auto focus) of this camera, it doesn't work correctly. In this mode camera's shooting button doesn't respond, why? Picture quality is very good, image stabilization too.
customer_reviews.author: Aren

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seems like the optics are not quite as sharp as they should be.
customer_reviews.author: A. White

customer_reviews.title: It works great as a starter lens especially for video
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how cheap I got this for! It works great as a starter lens especially for video.
customer_reviews.author: Tony R.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this from Enteric and through Amazon. It was purchased as a refurbished lens but it was brand-new and is working perfectly. Packaging and shipping are second to none. Everything was described as the seller said it would be, oh and thanks Joe from Enteric.....
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: great pictures at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I love this lens. Very good value - great pictures at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this lens and it is probably the one I use the most.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Olds

customer_reviews.title: Great lens
customer_reviews.text: Came on time, new nitro in original packaging works great just what I needed to replace a broken original canon lens for my rebel T6. Very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Mason

customer_reviews.title: Replacement lense.
customer_reviews.text: So glad I purchased my replacement lense from here. I had looked at prices elsewhere and it was alot more. I was so Happy to have my camera back.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Canon lens
customer_reviews.text: works great, got it with a Canon 70D camera I purchased at the same time.It's quiet and does great videos.
customer_reviews.author: John W. Freund

customer_reviews.title: Just what I ordered.
customer_reviews.text: Takes excellent pictures. Quick sharp focus and very quiet. It was time to replace my kit lens after years of abuse. This did the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Emory Davis

customer_reviews.title: Small & easy
customer_reviews.text: Git this for filming but the auto focus takes a little long.
customer_reviews.author: Will Nace

customer_reviews.title: Great Lens to Have!
customer_reviews.text: Great lens to have in your camera bag! This is the main lens I use (not a professional, just a hobby). I bought this lens for the price to replace my old 18-55mm lens that broke.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Boyle

customer_reviews.title: Works better than my original kit lens
customer_reviews.text: It's much better for video than the 40mm, and it as silent as advertised. It looks like they updated the optics to. I also liked anytime manual focus.
customer_reviews.author: Syed J.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: The auto focuses is a little iffy but works fine
customer_reviews.author: Tatyana antoine

customer_reviews.title: Happy,happy,happy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because the first one I have was stolen. it took years to replace it. Happy now!
customer_reviews.author: Green Forest

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Works so quietly I thought it was broken until I realized it was in fact focusing. Solid and just what you need in a standard lens. Great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Michael N R

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: the stm is worth the extra money at first I thought the lens was broken because I could not hear the auto focus at all. great for video on dslr
customer_reviews.author: gamer205

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Packed well and came in great condition! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: Decent walkaround lens
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my broken Canon EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS II kit lens that came with my t3i. I bought it cheap from the Amazon Marketplace. The quality of the lens is on par with the old kit lens, and the focal lengths are decent for a general walkaround lens. The STM focus is worlds better than the old non-STM lenses. Super quiet and really quick to focus. I also love being able to adjust to focus manually after autofocus by keeping the shutter button half-pressed. Great for throwing the focus somewhere else when the autofocus doesn't select what you want.
customer_reviews.author: Joey Cheung

customer_reviews.title: Good camera lens
customer_reviews.text: Good camera lens for budding picture taker. Delivered in time for Christmas present.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Kallick

customer_reviews.title: Quality is wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect just what I needed for stunning pics and smooth focusing video!
customer_reviews.author: jake

customer_reviews.title: Great lens
customer_reviews.text: I've only had it for a few weeks, but have taken many photos with it and it works great
customer_reviews.author: TwilightF

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Visible chromatic aberration, also has barrel distortion at 18mm. You'll quickly outgrow this lens.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Harnach

customer_reviews.title: A nice comfortable lens for mainly in house shooting
customer_reviews.text: A nice comfortable lens for mainly in house shooting. Not to far and not to close. A perfect lens for anybody.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Cronin

customer_reviews.title: Great lens for my t4i
customer_reviews.text: Great lens for my t4i, the only downfall is the Auto Focus, it tends to go out of focus when filming a moving shot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Lens
customer_reviews.text: Considering its a kit lens it puts out some very sharp pictures. Get the brand new one from adorama for a used price. Best bang for the buck lens ever.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Buyer

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend for a beginner or for personal use
customer_reviews.text: This is a stock lens so it has a very limited range. I would recommend for a beginner or for personal use.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice light lens for carrying around with sl1 camera
customer_reviews.text: Nice light lens for carrying around with sl1 camera. Pics look good. Focus is really silent. Bought as white box, It came with warrantee card. And i registered lens with cannon without a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Ira

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great lens. Replaced the original that came with my EOS 350d
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great lens, noticeable difference and improved quality over basic lenses.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: great lens for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is is a great lens for the price. I have an older rebel, and the kit lens broke. This one is definitely a step up, the image quality is fantastic. And it's only a little more expensive then an 18-55mm without image stabilization.
customer_reviews.author: Sara A  Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great lense
customer_reviews.text: Very smooth and quiet operation. I'm not a photo guy so don't know the technical details but I do love this lense
customer_reviews.author: K.C.B.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Canon 70D
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a lens that is good for AF on the Canon 70D for video, this would be one! I was hesitant in getting STM type lenses as I have read about the pancake version has noise, to my surprise, this was soo quiet that I thought it wasn't working. But it does work. So if you shoot videos with the 70D, get this or any STM type lenses, like the Canon 55-250mm
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Wu

customer_reviews.title: The lens is fantastic for video
customer_reviews.text: The lens is fantastic for video. I also have the EFS17-55mm USM lens which has a very similar focal length as is superior to this lens in almost all respects, but I needed a silent lens to use for video and this does a great job of that. Its a good value both video and images look really good.
customer_reviews.author: Brian_L

customer_reviews.title: Why some don't like it
customer_reviews.text: This is a great lens quite so quite you cant hear it. Pic are crisp and full of color. Some dont it because of the plastic mount, whi cares. For the price, go for it
customer_reviews.author: Camman

customer_reviews.title: A nice wide-angle lens
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for group photos and landscapes. This lens is a nice compliment to my 50-250mm. Between the two of them, I can compose a wide range of shots.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: The good: It focus pretty quite and fast
customer_reviews.text: It is a white box lens. There is small piece of label indicating "Canon EF-S 18-55 IS STEM Lens". The one I received is made in Taiwan. The good: It focus pretty quite and fast, but the accuracy is so so with 80D. and not that good with XTi. The bad: There is a lot of dust within/around the lens, which is dirtier than my ten year old lens. Overall, it is NOT recommended. .
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: STM video is great and smooth with the Canon 7D
customer_reviews.text: Phenomenal lens for the money. STM video is great and smooth with the Canon 7D.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Canon EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS STM Zoom Lens (Bulk Packaging)
product_meta.description:
Style:8114B002

EF-S 18–55MM F/3.5–5.6 IS STM

Designed for high-quality still image and video capture while being compact and lightweight, the new EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS STM lens features the optics, AF and image stabilization necessary for shooting in any number of situations. For brilliant image quality it has one high-precision aspheric lens to reduce chromatic aberration throughout the zoom range. It features optimized lens coatings to ensure exceptional color balance while minimizing ghosting and flare and a 7-blade circular aperture to ensure beautiful, soft backgrounds. For outstanding performance, the EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS STM lens perfectly complements the Movie Servo AF feature found on select EOS Cameras with a compact six-group zoom system and a new stepping motor and focus mechanism to deliver smooth and quiet continuous AF during movie shooting. Still photography benefits from a high-speed CPU and an optimized AF algorithm. Full-time manual focus is available in AF mode and the front element does not rotate during focus, perfect for use with polarizing filters. Handheld photography is enhanced by the lens' Optical Image Stabilizer system, offering the equivalent of four stops of compensation. Compact and highly versatile, it is the ideal lens to carry anywhere.

SPECIFICATIONS
 * Focal Length & Maximum Aperture: 18–55mm 1:3.5–5.6
 * Lens Construction: 13 elements in 11 groups
 * Diagonal Angle of View: 74°20' – 27°50'
 * Focus Adjustment: Inner focusing system
 * Closest Focusing Distance: 0.82 ft. / 0.25m
 * Filter Size: 58mm
 * Max Diameter x Length, Weight: 2.7 x 3.0 inches, approx. 7.2 oz. / 69.0 x 75.2mm, approx. 205g

SAMPLE IMAGE
